title: Noem, who sent Guard troops to Texas, resists using them for her own state's flooding - Democratic Underground Forums
text: [Create a free account](/?com=login&create=1)Support DU (and get rid of ads!): [Become a Star Member](/star) [Latest Breaking News](/?com=forum&id=1014) [General Discussion](/?com=forum&id=1002) [The DU Lounge](/?com=forum&id=1018) [All Forums](/?com=forums) [Issue Forums](/?com=forum&id=1311) [Culture Forums](/?com=forum&id=1312) [Alliance Forums](/?com=forum&id=1313) [Region Forums](/?com=forum&id=1314) [Support Forums](/?com=forum&id=1315) [Help & Search](/?com=search) (100,544 posts) Thu Jun 27, 2024, 06:24 PM 20 min ago [Omaha Steve](/?com=profile&uid=155620) Source: Nebraska Examiner By: Joshua Haiar - June 27, 2024 4:27 pm After ordering National Guard troops to the U.S.-Mexico border three times, Republican Gov. Kristi Noem is defending her decision to avoid sending troops to flood-ravaged areas in South Dakota, saying that it would be extremely expensive and that the Guard should only be used for a very crisis situation. Meanwhile, her spokesman left open the possibility that the Guard may still be utilized. The South Dakota Democratic Party is urging Noem to deploy the Guard to help with relief efforts after the past weeks record rainfall and flooding. While the governors decisions to send National Guard troops to the U.S.-Mexico border may have been intended as a political statement, it is imperative that our states resources are directed toward addressing the immediate and pressing needs of our residents, the party said Thursday in a news release. Gov. Kristi Noem speaks during a June 25, 2024, press conference in Yankton while state Department of Public Safety Secretary Bob Perry looks on. (Courtesy of the South Dakota Governors Office) Read more: https://nebraskaexaminer.com/2024/06/27/noem-who-sent-guard-troops-to-texas-resists-using-them-for-her-own-states-flooding/ [InfoView thread info, including edit history](/?com=thread&info=1&address=10143262899) [TrashPut this thread in your Trash Can (My DU » Trash Can)](/?com=login) [BookmarkAdd this thread to your Bookmarks (My DU » Bookmarks)](/?com=login)6 replies, 321 views [ShareGet links to this post and/or share on social media] [AlertAlert this post for a rule violation](/?com=login) [PowersThere are no powers you can use on this post] [EditCannot edit other people's posts] [ReplyReply to this post](/?com=post&post&forum=1014&pid=3262899) [EditCannot edit other people's posts] [Rec (3)] [ReplyReply to this post](/?com=post&forum=1014&pid=3262899) [NoneDon't highlight anything](#!)
